org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.http

类 SwiftRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.http.SwiftRestClient

  • public final class SwiftRestClient
extends Object
    This implements the client-side of the Swift REST API The core actions put, get and query data in the Swift object store, after authenticationg the client. Logging: Logging at DEBUG level displays detail about the actions of this client, including HTTP requests and responses -excluding authentication details.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header NEWEST
      Header that says "use newest version" -ensures that the query doesn't pick up older versions served by an eventually consistent filesystem (except in the special case of a network partition, at which point no guarantees about consistency can be made.

    • 字段详细资料

      • NEWEST

        public static final org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header NEWEST
        Header that says "use newest version" -ensures that the query doesn't pick up older versions served by an eventually consistent filesystem (except in the special case of a network partition, at which point no guarantees about consistency can be made.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getData

        public HttpBodyContent getData(SwiftObjectPath path,
                      long offset,
                      long length)
                        throws IOException
        Make an HTTP GET request to Swift to get a range of data in the object.
        参数:
        path - path to object
        offset - offset from file beginning
        length - file length
        返回:
        The input stream -which must be closed afterwards.
        抛出:
        IOException - Problems
        SwiftException - swift specific error
        FileNotFoundException - path is not there

      • getContentLength

        public long getContentLength(URI uri)
                      throws IOException
        Returns object length
        参数:
        uri - file URI
        返回:
        object length
        抛出:
        SwiftException - on swift-related issues
        IOException - on network/IO problems

      • getContentLength

        public long getContentLength(SwiftObjectPath path)
                      throws IOException
        Get the length of the remote object
        参数:
        path - object to probe
        返回:
        the content length
        抛出:
        IOException - on any failure

      • getData

        public HttpBodyContent getData(SwiftObjectPath path,
                      org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
                        throws IOException
        Get the path contents as an input stream. Warning: this input stream must be closed to avoid keeping Http connections open.
        参数:
        path - path to file
        requestHeaders - http headers
        返回:
        byte[] file data or null if the object was not found
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults
        FileNotFoundException - if there is nothing at the path

      • getObjectLocation

        public byte[] getObjectLocation(SwiftObjectPath path,
                       org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
                         throws IOException
        Returns object location as byte[]
        参数:
        path - path to file
        requestHeaders - http headers
        返回:
        byte[] file data or null if the object was not found
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults

      • findObjectsByPrefix

        public byte[] findObjectsByPrefix(SwiftObjectPath path,
                         org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
                           throws IOException
        Find objects under a prefix
        参数:
        path - path prefix
        requestHeaders - optional request headers
        返回:
        byte[] file data or null if the object was not found
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults
        FileNotFoundException - if nothing is at the end of the URI -that is, the directory is empty

      • listDeepObjectsInDirectory

        public byte[] listDeepObjectsInDirectory(SwiftObjectPath path,
                                boolean listDeep,
                                org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
                                  throws IOException
        Find objects in a directory
        参数:
        path - path prefix
        requestHeaders - optional request headers
        返回:
        byte[] file data or null if the object was not found
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults
        FileNotFoundException - if nothing is at the end of the URI -that is, the directory is empty

      • copyObject

        public boolean copyObject(SwiftObjectPath src,
                 SwiftObjectPath dst,
                 org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... headers)
                   throws IOException
        Copy an object. This is done by sending a COPY method to the filesystem which is required to handle this WebDAV-level extension to the base HTTP operations.
        参数:
        src - source path
        dst - destination path
        headers - any headers
        返回:
        true if the status code was considered successful
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults

      • upload

        public void upload(SwiftObjectPath path,
          InputStream data,
          long length,
          org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
            throws IOException
        Uploads file as Input Stream to Swift. The data stream will be closed after the request.
        参数:
        path - path to Swift
        data - object data
        length - length of data
        requestHeaders - http headers
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults

      • delete

        public boolean delete(SwiftObjectPath path,
             org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
               throws IOException
        Deletes object from swift. The result is true if this operation did the deletion.
        参数:
        path - path to file
        requestHeaders - http headers
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO Faults

      • headRequest

        public org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header[] headRequest(String reason,
                                                 SwiftObjectPath path,
                                                 org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
                                                   throws IOException
        Issue a head request
        参数:
        reason - reason -used in logs
        path - path to query
        requestHeaders - request header
        返回:
        the response headers. This may be an empty list
        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems
        FileNotFoundException - if there is nothing at the end

      • putRequest

        public int putRequest(SwiftObjectPath path,
             org.apache.commons.httpclient.Header... requestHeaders)
               throws IOException
        Issue a put request
        参数:
        path - path
        requestHeaders - optional headers
        返回:
        the HTTP response
        抛出:
        IOException - any problem

      • authenticate

        public AccessToken authenticate()
                         throws IOException
        Authenticate to Openstack Keystone As well as returning the access token, the member fields token, endpointURI and objectLocationURI are set up for re-use.

        This method is re-entrant -if more than one thread attempts to authenticate neither will block -but the field values with have those of the last caller.

        返回:
        authenticated access token
        抛出:
        IOException

      • createContainer

        public void createContainer(String containerName)
                     throws IOException
        Create a container -if it already exists, do nothing
        参数:
        containerName - the container name
        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems
        SwiftBadRequestException - invalid container name
        SwiftInvalidResponseException - error from the server

      • getInstance

        public static SwiftRestClient getInstance(URI filesystemURI,
                          org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration config)
                                   throws IOException
        Create an instance against a specific FS URI,
        参数:
        filesystemURI - filesystem to bond to
        config - source of configuration data
        返回:
        REST client instance
        抛出:
        IOException - on instantiation problems

      • pathToURI

        public static URI pathToURI(SwiftObjectPath path,
            URI endpointURI)
                     throws SwiftException
        Converts Swift path to URI to make request. This is public for unit testing
        参数:
        path - path to object
        endpointURI - damain url e.g. http://domain.com
        返回:
        valid URI for object
        抛出:
        SwiftException

      • isLocationAware

        public boolean isLocationAware()
        Is this client bound to a location aware Swift blobstore -that is, can you query for the location of partitions
        返回:
        true iff the location of multipart file uploads can be determined.

      • getBlocksizeKB

        public long getBlocksizeKB()
        Get the blocksize of this filesystem
        返回:
        a blocksize >0
